title.narrative: FLC: Promoting Gender Equality for rural and Urban women market traders in Tanzania for sustainable socio economic development

Therefore the main objectives of this project is: to mobilise and build strong movement of women traders in rural and urban markets towards gender equality and transformation of local gove rnment institutional frameworks in addressing gender barriers on market places; to incease awareness and understanding of women traders on their basic rights and duties in order to influence policies for good governance and demand for their basic economic rights for socio economic development;
